website_summaries.verdict: This basket is easy to assemble and looks just like the baskets you find on the course.
pros: The sturdy design and 24 chains make this a great basket for simulating putting on the course
Customers love how easy it is to assemble and transport
cons: The zinc-coated chains will rust if left outside

customer_reviews.title: Pretty solid quality product
customer_reviews.text: Pretty solid quality product. Easy to assemble. Took a couple stars away because it is not even remotely water resistant. Get a cover or it will rust quick! It was also very poorly shipped. The box it came in was not too damaged, but upon opening it there were a number of scratches on the parts because they were moving around. Chains and metal edges scraping against each other doesn't help the incredibly thin coat of rust protection.
customer_reviews.author: Maxwell Edison

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great for practicing. Very sturdy and easy to move around. Also, it can be stored outside so you’re not taking it down after every use.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Wolfgram

customer_reviews.title: great basket, great price, looks awesome !!
customer_reviews.text: It's a great basket for a great price. It goes together easily, it has some weight to it (built well), the chains work well, breaks down easily to take with you, and it's sturdy, even without the pins they supply you to hold it sturdy to the ground.
customer_reviews.author: Sagerods

customer_reviews.title: Not built to last but overall good basket.
customer_reviews.text: Not built to last! Really loved this basket till you realize the skipped out on quality manufacturing for the base. Lasted a while I think 2 or 3 years before it broke. Definitely buying another basket that is more sturdy at the base. I have a dynamic disc marksman that is constructed much more sturdy and built to last.
customer_reviews.author: Babbitt's

customer_reviews.title: This thing is awesome!!!
customer_reviews.text: This basket is absolutely perfect. Assembled in about 30 seconds. It’s super sturdy. Everything is regulation. 24 chains for the perfect catch. All of the chains are permanently fixed too so they don’t get tangled or come off. I was very surprised at the quality of the this product. Now I just need to buy 17 more of them...
customer_reviews.author: Cody

customer_reviews.title: It's a good basket.
customer_reviews.text: Sorry its a bit late but I would have given it a five star but what I got wasn't exactly what I thought I had ordered. From all the pictures they clearly have a thick black metal band on the top and that was one of the reasons I bought it. But mine doesnt have it :/ that was also what I was going to attach lights to now I have to figure something else. I didn't want to return it because we were looking forward to having it arrive and having some fun in the sun so other then we like it very much.
customer_reviews.author: Viridiana Lemus

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for backyard putting!
customer_reviews.text: Been putting on this basket almost every day since I got it, and I love it! It seems super solid, and I couldn't be happier with my purchase. You will get more chain outs than a higher end basket, and some discs escape the basket easier, but for practice it's perfect! Haven't it not grab everything makes it a better when practicing as it's easier to hit things when you get to a course. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew J. Mauer

customer_reviews.title: Great Practice Basket
customer_reviews.text: Assembly was quick and easy. Light enough to easily move around the yard, but heavy enough that it’s sturdy and does not fall over.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Genuine disc golf course experience at home
customer_reviews.text: I have been trying to find a real disc golf basket for home use. Everytime I look at the reviews I get confused so I finally narrowed it down to 2 or 3 and bought this MVP Black Hole Pro 24-Chain Portable Disc Golf Basket. Wow!!!! This is awesome. It feels really good. It captures fast or slow discs from far and near. It's almost as good as Charlie Brown's kit-eating tree. I just ordered 2 more to setup with 3 tees for a three-by-three 9-hole course experience in our 1 acre yard.
customer_reviews.author: Supporting Role

customer_reviews.title: These baskets are bomb!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was amazed at how easy the assembly was on these Black Holes! Had two baskets fully assembled in 10 minutes. A bunch of reviews noted shoddy packaging, but i believe they have now fixed this issue. Mine were packed very well. These babies catch discs great (caught a few 100 footers at high speed no problem) and have a standard size basket (unlike many portables that have a shallow basket from standard).
customer_reviews.author: Nate H.

customer_reviews.title: Best for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had the basket for a month. The basket and chains are of good quality extremely easy to put together and looks nice, but the poles are on the thinner side, nothing has happened I’ve had no problems with it just letting you know. When it is fully constructed it is pretty heavy. But I would definitely recommend for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Tatokain

customer_reviews.title: It is well built.
customer_reviews.text: The basket was in a box delivered within a box. Which means no damage and it was very easy to assembled. Started putting right after assembling it and was impressed how sturdy it was putting in my garage and how good it was to hear the chains clan while throwing. Would recommend it to all disc golfers!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: For $128 I wasn't sure if this was going to have the quality I was looking for but it's straight, sturdy, heavy duty chains, and everything fits perfect. Plus the chain links won't eat up your disks with sharp edges like I've read about on other, similar baskets. Very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: J. Chastain

customer_reviews.title: Portable and sets up easy with no tools
customer_reviews.text: I am unsure about the durability of this basket since I've only had it a week, but it seems of pretty good quality. Arrived in great condition, and was built very quickly with no tools needed. Also comes with stakes to help keep it secure to the ground outdoors. The stakes don't look super strong, so you may not want to hammer them into rocky soil. The top piece holding the chains can be removed for quieter indoor practice. I will buy another when the time comes 👍
customer_reviews.author: brycekins

customer_reviews.title: I love it.
customer_reviews.text: Comes in a big heavy box. Pretty easy to assemble. Catches discs well and overall feels like the holes at a course, albeit a little less stable and every once in a while a near miss occurs that probably would have gone in at a course but the bottom cage vibrates a little too much and it flips out. Not a big deal at all I’m talking like 1/100 putts this happens and it’s for practicing after all so who cares. I’d be hesitant to leave it out out in the rain I carry it back and forth between where I practice and back under a small awning where it is sheltered (about 25 feet) without much difficulty.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Soled

customer_reviews.title: Freaking aweosme!!
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely happy with this basket. I've owned several practice baskets over the years and this one is by far the best I've had for so little money spent. It's a very sturdy piece of equipment. It's pretty heavy but I like that. You will be very happy with your purchase if you decide to buy it. I'm probably going to buy another one soon. Just very very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Billy L. Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Great basket, be careful with threads
customer_reviews.text: This basket is well made. It is designed quite inexpensively, but functions perfectly. The only advice I would give is to assemble the basket upside down. If you assemble with the heavy chains on top the screws will become crossthreaded and are nearly impossible to replace. The basket I received was listed as "used like new" but 2 of the screws and nut combos were stripped beyond useability. The basket was otherwise in new condition. Thankfully I work in a metal shop and know enough to rethreaded the nuts and bolts before making the crossthreading worse. I also plan to replace the nuts and bolts someday which will involve some welding and hydraulic presses.
customer_reviews.author: Russell Reichman

customer_reviews.title: Missing piece renders item useless.
customer_reviews.text: Missing part. Top cap missing. Factory Box had clearly been opened and then taped shut. Item is useless as is. Contacted the customer service number during business hours and got no response. $170 metal lawn sculpture which does not appear as sturdy as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Louie

customer_reviews.title: Low quality
customer_reviews.text: I am usually not one to complain, and I have never written a product review before, however, I am thoroughly disappointed with the quality of this product. I purchased as a birthday gift, and upon arrival, as we are unboxing the item, there was a large amount of corrosion within the pole and all over the basket. The threads within the pole system were completely corroded and the rack to hold the chains as well. A huge bummer and definitely returning.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NOT DURABLE
customer_reviews.text: This basket's base will rot out very quickly with much moisture exposure at all and the screw component will never screw tightly again. I ended up removing my base after it died (in less than one year) and hanging it in my basement.
customer_reviews.author: Ross R Conover

customer_reviews.title: Seller shipped late, 6days
customer_reviews.text: The box was all jacked up from shipping, it’s “prime 2 day” shipping and it took over a week! The basket is nice good heavy duty, heavy but very easy to put together I gave this rating a three star because of the seller not the product....
customer_reviews.author: Rad

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up and looks well made.  Very fun backyard addition.
customer_reviews.text: We set ours up right away and have had fun coming up with backyard Frisbee golf games. Only issue is the one we got looked used out of the box. Had a few spots that the paint was chipped and the packaging was re taped. No issue for us and after 6 weeks of daily use it is holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: Dublin

customer_reviews.title: This basket is pretty much the regular course hole
customer_reviews.text: This basket is pretty much the regular course hole. It catches pretty well and makes a good sound. It takes about 1 minute to assemble. If I have to knit pick things, I would say the chain rings sits on the basket which is not the case in any of the pro baskets. If they increase the upper pole by an inch, it will be perfect. My basket is also slightly slanted, like 5 degree out of 90, but overall I am very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Umesh

customer_reviews.title: Great product great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I got this goal for Christmas and I was so excited to use it, we set it up immediately and started playing in the snow! Never too early to work on my puts. It's sturdy and plays like a professional goal. I was moving it between places to change it up a bit, and I accidentally backed into it with my pickup and bent the base. I was so pissed at myself, but I talked to MVP and they sent me a replacement base. Awesome! I'm an MVP customer for life. Great product and great customer service, money well spent
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: My husband had to have this.
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought this so he could practice frisbee golf. Since you can't do much. He and friends play golf. He Love his new sport. It seems to be becoming popular now.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Renner

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase!
customer_reviews.text: We love our disc golf goal. I wish we had paid a little more money for the version above this one, which we hd already and thought we were purchasing again. This one tips during storms. The other is much heavier and more difficult to move, but it hardly ever tips.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cannot be beat
customer_reviews.text: Hands down the best at-home basket. So close to most course baskets that you won't notice the difference. The basket isn't as deep, but the chains grab perfectly. Light enough to move around the yard while assembled and super easy to take apart and reassemble if you need to. Spend the money, folks!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Great basket
customer_reviews.text: Assembled in a couple of minutes. Feels very sturdy in the grass. Chains have a nice weight and satisfying feeling when the discs catch on them.
customer_reviews.author: E. Sultani

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, did not bend when it fill over
customer_reviews.text: This is the only basket I have purchased so I cannot compare it to other (less expensive) options. Seems to be sturdy and well built. Mine blew over in the wind because I did not have it supported by the stakes they provided to prevent this. Even so, the basket is fine and did not go our of round. Seems like a great buy! Easy to assemble as well.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan ramundo

customer_reviews.title: Great basket, little heavy to carry
customer_reviews.text: Great basket. Catches a disc great. Only issue is that the Male screws that connects the two poles are a little off center, but hasn't caused any issues. I would suggest to also get the carrying case if you plan on transporting to other locations. Pain to carry big box, so I've been using a foldable dolly to move it from car to field when I take it to the park.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Thayer

customer_reviews.title: Well Made and easy to assemble!
customer_reviews.text: Put together in less than 5 mins. It is very sturdy and well made. Hit a shot from over 40 feet away and it did not tip and I did not have the stakes in the ground. Would recommend this one over the practice version as it only $20 more.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: I love the black and silver
customer_reviews.text: My husband ordered this basket for our backyard... meaning we now have two. Oh boy. That being said, I love the black and silver... it's not too bright, and blends well with our trees. This is great for practicing your putting, or rolling into a more open area to practice mid-range or distance shots.
customer_reviews.author: MamaManda1025

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: This basket was worth every single penny . It really is strong and well made , and is very easy to assemble and disassemble. It packs into a easy carry case for taking it on the go or to parks like I have. It is very easy to pick up and move around as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy! Excellent heavy duty chains
customer_reviews.text: Better than expected. Really sturdy and well made. We made a small 3 hole course in our yard and play every night. We haven’t cemented them down yet, but haven’t had any problems with just the stakes holding it in place. Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: MVP Disc Golf basket
customer_reviews.text: Basket is a pretty good basket but will not withstand wind by itself. Use anchor pegs supplied for stability.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Van Den Broek

customer_reviews.title: Durable and Easy to Assemble
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my son who plays disc golf. He said it was good quality, and he put it together in 5 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Francine

customer_reviews.title: Best basket for your buck
customer_reviews.text: This basket is perfect for playing at home, or transporting somewhere. So easy to assemble. Stands up great!
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased for a 60th birthday gift and it has already gotten the money worth! It is nice to pack up and travel with, or even move around your own yard. The product is not heavy once assembled.
customer_reviews.author: Shelbey

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This was a great Xmas gift. Sturdy yet light enough to move alone. Solid construction and would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Joanne

customer_reviews.title: easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend LOVES disc golf. So this was his birthday present, and we've used it so much just in the backyard! So worth the money if someone loves to play! Stable, easy to put together, heavy duty. I can't say enough good things about this basket!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen A Graham

customer_reviews.title: Very Solid
customer_reviews.text: Awesome basket for the backyard. Come apart easily and you can just set the band and chains inside the cage to carry to the car to assemble in an open field or wherever you please. Couldn’t ask for a better basket for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Hoover

customer_reviews.title: This is sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something that felt like being on the course. And this does for me...even without it being secured to the ground. We move the basket around fairly easily and the chains are thick and sticky. If you have any reservations about this product, rest assured, it's solid.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Sattler

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Have had it for a month and ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Have had it for a month and I use it everyday goes together with no tools effortlessly and is super solid it's very lightweight and portable and also is solid under most conditions whether it's on grass dirt or a hard flat surface
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Price

customer_reviews.title: As good as it gets for $140
customer_reviews.text: This is my first practice basket. I absolutely love it so far, there are some issues with getting the basket and chains level, but those are pretty easily corrected by adjusting the way the components are threaded into each other. Very little wobble when hit, the base looks thin but it holds up fine. Overall, no complaints for a good target at this price point.
customer_reviews.author: Brent

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and catches well
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, chains catch well, great for practice. It is loud, especially if used indoors -- I solved this by wrapping the pole with drawer liner and tape. Still makes a satisfying sound but without being deafening.
customer_reviews.author: Esteban Camargo

customer_reviews.title: Chains are a symphony to hear when your putt hits just right.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great disc golf target for any price. Very impressed with this basket, good build quality and the welds are well done. Chains are a symphony to hear when your putt hits just right. Very comparable to the pro quality baskets we have on the local course.
customer_reviews.author: the one called TJ

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Nice middle row practice basket. The base is sturdy, I haven’t had it fall over yet and have smashed 45-50 footers. Chains quality is great, appearance is great. 2reasons I didnt give it 5 stars: it sits lower than regulation, and I have a bad habit of throwing outs low Which is why I needed a basket... second is I wish the actual basket was a littler more heavy duty. Assembly was a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: SlickWillyG

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service, would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Basket catches very well and assembles easily. I was very satisfied for a few months until the weld at bottom of the last pole broke when the basket fell over (as several others have indicated). They sent a new pole the very same week and fixed it. It's back to perfect order again. In the future I'll use the included stakes more to secure it to the ground. Even with the weld breaking, I would buy it again knowing that MVP will back up their products.
customer_reviews.author: D. Castle

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Stand is a little wobbly, but works as advertized. Just beware this item does not come in Amazon box so if it is a gift have it delivered elsewhere so it doesn’t spoil the surprise.
customer_reviews.author: Meoconnor32

customer_reviews.title: Great Basket!
customer_reviews.text: Basket arrived on time and in excellent condition. Good strength. Has been outside for a couple months and no sign of rush or any other issues.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Martin

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the price. Only a little rust on chains after 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: casey

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband, and he absolutely loves it! It's a little heavy, but that means it doesn't blow over in high winds. It hasn't rusted yet, so no issues being outdoors all the time. I definitely recommend this!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Foster Haase

customer_reviews.title: We love it!
customer_reviews.text: Great to have in the backyard, sturdy but fairly light weight. SO easy to assemble, it seriously only took like two minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Kory

customer_reviews.title: Solid, easy to assemble, well worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, great value! Installs in 5 mins. Sturdy, just like the course.
customer_reviews.author: D. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up and easy to move if you need to.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome. I'm suddenly really good from 30 feet away...but terrible from 12 feet and in....might be a me problem. Set up is unbelievably easy and we're having a blast. Really easy to move around the yard to change the "course". 7 thumbs up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid construction but not strait
customer_reviews.text: It is solid, looks nice and is the same size as what is out on course. Only problem is that the screw hole seems to not be welded very strait, so the top is noticeably crooked. Doesn't affect play too much but is annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Gus

customer_reviews.title: Good for one loacation but not if you intend to move it
customer_reviews.text: We had a fun day playing it but the base holding the net nut weakened. We moved it several times and this weakened it. Seller asked what was the problem then never followed up. If you are going to leave it in one place it would probably be fine but if you intend to move it be careful.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: 24 chain is the way to go
customer_reviews.text: I upgraded my at-home basket with this brand and I'm very satisfied. The double-chain setup is worth the upgraded cost in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: ChucknMurph

customer_reviews.title: Just like the real baskets
customer_reviews.text: True size. Very sturdy. Only negative is it does not have wheels. Bought 2 for my son to throw around the yard and he has spent hours using them.
customer_reviews.author: Karen McCollum

customer_reviews.title: Best buy!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great basket! Ordered on a Saturday and arrived on Monday. Very easy to assemble. Takes less than 5 minutes. No tools required. Very sturdy. So happy with my new basket.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel S. Willis

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed so far
customer_reviews.text: Just received today. It is for my uncles 40th Birthday on the 27th. The box was completely beat up and opened, and when it’s moved it sounds like a bunch of glass/metal hitting against each other. I will be very lucky if everything is in there when he opens it.
customer_reviews.author: KatWomanZZ!!

customer_reviews.title: DiscGolf
customer_reviews.text: When you can’t get to the course get this for your house. So you can bang chains anytime
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Nice sturdy disc hole
customer_reviews.text: My hubby loves this (and so do I)! Bought this as a Christmas gift and he still enjoys it. It's gone though a couple bouts of snow and several days of rain and seems like it will hold up for a while. It hasn't fallen over and is nice and sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: N. Bloczynski

customer_reviews.title: Not the worst goal I’ve thrown at.
customer_reviews.text: It’s great but the top rim is too thick and makes it hard to actually putt towards because it always denies my discs although it’s assembled nice and looks great .
customer_reviews.author: Blaine

customer_reviews.title: This disc golf basket is awesome! I bought it for home use since I ...
customer_reviews.text: This disc golf basket is awesome! I bought it for home use since I am not able to get out to the courses as much as I would like. My son and I have a great time playing with it at home it's durable and has more chains than other ones that I've seen around.
customer_reviews.author: John Hill

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift for my husband, it was quite a hit! Sturdy, but still movable.
customer_reviews.author: Nell

customer_reviews.title: Great basket for any backyard
customer_reviews.text: The MVP Black Hole is a great at home disc basket that is worth the price. I also ordered the transit case and the precision put attachment with case. AWESOME.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: bent pole or threads
customer_reviews.text: Basket came and it wasn't scratched or anything however I put it together and the top pole is crooked. It doesn't screw in straight or stand straight. Not what I would say the leading edge...
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my brother - he says he loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Rainbow Bright

customer_reviews.title: Great basket!
customer_reviews.text: We used this for putter practice and home parties. Kid entertainment etc.
customer_reviews.author: angel

customer_reviews.title: Nice Basket
customer_reviews.text: There was some damage on the item when I unboxed it. Contacted the seller who replaced said part immediately, before I could reply with photos of damage. New piece arrived very quickly. Basket is great and sturdy. Chains are nice and heavy. Appreciate the customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Swenson

customer_reviews.title: Loves them!
customer_reviews.text: Gift for Son, who has built (and plays) 18 hole professional disc golf. He loves them!
customer_reviews.author: David J. Garvey, USMC

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Well made, solid built. Will keep the grand-kids busy for some time.
customer_reviews.author: Bill C

customer_reviews.title: Great Basket!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is great for practicing and no trouble to move around, very good value.
customer_reviews.author: MaKee

customer_reviews.title: He didn't like the last one I bought which was only a ...
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this! He didn't like the last one I bought which was only a few dollars cheaper. "This one is the real deal!" It is comparable to the ones on the various courses he plays! It is the right size as the pro ones. He loved the chains which don't allow you to throw through it. He also was happy with the basket! It was very easy to put together and well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa L.

customer_reviews.title: Great for putting practice!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and plays like a real pro golf hole. Very happy with the feel.
customer_reviews.author: marknel111

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This basket is sturdy and catches like baskets on the local courses considering it's PDGA approved.
customer_reviews.author: TomNeely

customer_reviews.title: Stable and so much fun
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Sturdy and stable when you are playing.
customer_reviews.author: WellRead

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Loved how easy it was to assemble and how sturdy it was definitely looks just like a real basket
customer_reviews.author: Ducky

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I’m a beginner at disc golf and I can’t get enough. This is perfect to practice in my backyard. I think the practice has really paid off! It’s very easy to put together and seems durable.
customer_reviews.author: Miknan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect at home basket!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely easy to setup! Took it outside immediately and staked it into the ground in my backyard. Perfect at home practice basket! Sturdy chains! Overall excellent product!!
customer_reviews.author: Randall Spence

customer_reviews.title: Fun Game for Everyone
customer_reviews.text: Fun game, we are new to this game but had fun making obstacle course in the back yard. A game that all ages can play together.
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what you need for a quality, moveable practice basket.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty much exactly what I expected: a sturdy, easy to assemble/disassemble practice basket. I have no complaints and would definitely recommend for the price and what you get. Occasional spit outs, but we talkin bout practice. Practice. Not a game. Practice. (:
customer_reviews.author: cam rush

customer_reviews.title: Chipped Paint
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality basket at a fair price. Was disappointed to notice while assembling that there where several chips in the paint straigt out of the box

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husband. He loves it. It is heavy and not very portable. But does the job.
customer_reviews.author: JennaBee

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality Control.
customer_reviews.text: I expected better quality control from such a highly recommended product. The top bolt/cap was welded way crooked on mine so that when you screw it in only one side tightens down leaving the entire basket/chains portion to rock badly. The other pieces had some woble to them too but are tolerable.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Ybarra

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, not too heavy. Just what we needed.
customer_reviews.author: K. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Its official. I love it.
customer_reviews.text: Just got it today and was unboxed and putting in a couple minutes. I can take it apart and put it together very easily. Bolts up nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Let's be real
customer_reviews.text: Looks really cool, lots of music friends who don't even disc like coming over to chill and putt while I grill in the back yard, great product for good times, this is definitely the MVP of baskets
customer_reviews.author: madmattness

customer_reviews.title: Pretty pretty pretty pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Overall great! Top ring slightly unlevel. I tried to bend it back a bit and it’s not horrible. But, for practice, it’s perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great practice basket
customer_reviews.text: Took longer to open the packages than to assemble the basket! Great practice basket, strong and sturdy - love it!
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl Angst

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to assemble, sturdy, exactly what I was looking for and a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy it
customer_reviews.text: My husband loved me when I bought this. He’s since divorced me, but the basket he still loves
customer_reviews.author: Smotheredbyidiots

customer_reviews.title: Money well spent
customer_reviews.text: I bought one for my back yard. Then, I bought another. Now, I've added a couple thousand extra steps to my day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and sturdy. Not much difference between this and the heavy duty pro tees on the course.
customer_reviews.author: CMR

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my boyfriend for his birthday 2 years ago and he absolutely love it and it still in good condition still!
customer_reviews.author: Georgina Buckingham

customer_reviews.title: Best product by far for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and if secured properly to ground the basket is as good as any. What a great basket for the price. I ran a piece of re-bar down the pole base and it’s not moving at all.
customer_reviews.author: BL

customer_reviews.title: Best Basket for your Money
customer_reviews.text: Great disc basket! Easy to assemble, built to last, and priced just right!
customer_reviews.author: Leighton Barber

customer_reviews.title: Nice work MVP!
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality product. Not as forgiving as some permanent baskets...hope it makes me a better putter I chose this over similar products because it is a Michigan small business
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Incredible Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this for practice in the backyard. On top of a quality product, they have some of the best customer service I have ever encountered. They made it so easy to get replacement parts. Will be loyal to this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

product_meta.title: MVP Black Hole Pro 24-Chain Portable Disc Golf Basket Target
product_meta.description: MVP Black Hole Disc Golf Baskets. Introducing a series of three disc golf baskets from MVP Disc Sports, the Black Hole Pro, Black Hole Precision, and Black Hole Practice. These baskets are designed by MVP and manufactured to the highest quality and customer value. Retailers may drop ship any of the Black Hole baskets directly to disc golfers from MVP Distribution Headquarters at no extra charge, keeping overall prices low. All three Black Hole models share the same heavy duty portable base, pole, and cage assembly, all conforming to PDGA height and diameter specifications. The Black Hole Pro and Black Hole Precision models feature a slim band design and course-quality heavy gauge chain, while the Black Hole Practice brings a lighter option with no header band and lighter chains seen in the Hive basket. The Black Hole Precision features one narrow focus tier of chains to demand a far more accurate putt during practice. The Black Hole Pro is designed for the most realistic putting experience off the course.
feature_bullets: 24 HIGH VISIBILITY zinc coated heavy duty course weighted chains
12 OUTER AND 12 INNER chains equidistantly oriented for zero weak pockets - reducing cut throughs and pole bounces
UNIQUELY ENGINEERED - assembles or disassembles in under 1 minute
PDGA APPROVED - built to standard PDGA height and size regulation
